result.execSummary:
The defendant Paul L. Plotkin was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Contact after Domestic Abuse Arrest, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 968.075(5)(a)1.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Waukesha County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes:
Court costs are to be paid as a Condition of Probation.  Court waives DNA surcharge and sample.

  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment deemed appropriate by the agent.

Anger Management or Domestic Violence Counseling and follow through with any treatment deemed appropriate by the agent.
No contact with Matt Gamble.
No VIOLENT contact with defendant's wife.
ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Submit to random urine screens.
No use or possession of alcohol, illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of any and all prescriptions.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Paul L. Plotkin in court with attorney Bradley J. Bloch.
Jury Trial Cancelled.

Defendant enters a plea of No Contest to count 1.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of count 1.
Repeater enhancer is struck.
Count 2 is dismissed as a read in.
Defendant presented statements to the court.


Court orders the following:
SENTENCE WITHHELD.

Term of Probation: 18 Months.
Concurrent to: Case 15CM1602.
CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
Anger Management or D.V. Counseling and follow through with any treatment deemed appropriate by the agent.
AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended by the agent.
Absolute Sobriety;  Random U.A.'s ; 
No Use or Possession of alcohol, controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.
No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
No contact with:  Matt Gamble.
No Violent Contact with:  Defendant's Wife (Laurie).

Costs:  $243
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  Court Waives.
To be paid as a Condition of Probation.
State's Demand for Discovery and Inspection and Notice of Intent to Use Defendant's Statement and DNA Evidence. Witness list attached.

Jury status hearing on August 25, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial - 12 person on August 30, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Paul L. Plotkin in court with attorney Bradley J. Bloch by Atty. Kuchler.  Jury trial - 12 person scheduled for August 30, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury status hearing scheduled for August 25, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Not Guilty Plea Entered.
Defense waives reading of the information.
File not called on the record.

Defendant waives his/her right to a Preliminary Hearing.

Defendant Paul L. Plotkin in court with attorney Gerard Kuchler for attorney Bradley J. Bloch.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Date remains as scheduled.   Arraignment to be addressed before the Judge.

Cash bail previously posted to be refunded to poster.Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant is not to have any violent contact with victim/witness listed in the criminal complaint.

Defendant Paul L. Plotkin in court with attorney Bradley J. Bloch.   Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Preliminary Hearing requested.  Preliminary time limits waived.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 17, 2016 at 08:15 am.
